channel.title: http on The Insane Techie
channel.description: Recent content in http on The Insane Techie

item.title: A simple HTTP client and a server in C
item.description: The HTTP server sends the files requested by the client, if it is available at the server. The HTTP client uses GET method for requesting files from the server. Only .html, .txt and .pdf files are implemented. On receiving the file, the client program opens it using firefox or gedit or acrobat reader, as per the file type. Note that the given programs were done in Linux (Debian) environment. httpserver.c
